title: Danno the Manno a Birthday Paisanno!
content:
Happy Birthday to the Reading Redhead!

Chris

 [‹ General Type ID Terminology?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152156/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40601 "Go to previous forum topic") [Rs Fighting ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152156/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40590 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dezcom

comments.content: Greetings from Germany, too! I wish you the very best – enjoy Reading! The best you could do ... Herzlichen Glückwunsch zum Geburtstag, lieber Dan.

Happy B’day, Dan!

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO

Alles gute!

Karsten
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152156im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/danno_5270.png)

Happy Birthday, Dan!

Sharon

Happy Birthday Dan!

I really hope I get an awesome thread title on my birthday...

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152156im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/happy-birthday_4279.png)

ChrisL
Happy Birthday, Dan!
Happy birthday, Dan - set the town on fire tonight. Cheers to you!
HBD Dan, I hope Reading can withstand the onslaught of epic raging awesomeness you are about to perpetrate. All the best.

Thanks so much everybody! The onslaught of epic raging awesomeness is going to have to wait until Friday night. At the moment, we’re just one day into our third design workshop with Gerard Unger, so tonight’s revelry is going to be limited to determining the best thickness for my typeface’s thins…
Happy Birthday!

A workshop with Gerard Unger sounds like a pretty good birthday to me :)

All the best, Dan.

Happy birthday to you  
Happy birthday to you  
Happy birthday dear Dan,  
Happy birthday to you!

j a m e s
Happy Birthday, Dan!

hope your hairlines help your happiness!

can’t wait for the party on the weekend.
Alles Gute, Dan!

<cite>A workshop with Gerard Unger sounds like a pretty good birthday to me :)</cite>

That’s an understatement!

Anyway, happy birthday, Dan.

_\>A workshop with Gerard Unger sounds like a pretty good birthday to me :)_

I guess that I have gotten what I wanted this year ;-)

For a fine-looking redhead, Dan.

Yeah! I like the man.

These are the best candle letters I could find in a hurry.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152156im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/birthdaycandles_5660.jpg)

j a m e s
Just think how many beverages you can consume on Friday! ;-) Have a great one....
Happy birthday, Dan!
Belated greetings, Dan!
Belated Birthday Greetings!!

A very happy (belated) birthday, Dan.  
Best wishes and many more to come =^)
Happy Birthday Dan! How did those thins work out?
They are coming along. They should be right by June. Maybe May. So far I’ve still just 15 lowercase characters. About 14 of them need a lot of work, I’d wager ;-)

Then you are doing well, Dan!

ChrisL
Exxxxxcellent, Dan. I expect we’ll see them in the TypeGallery at TypeCon next year?
Shame on me...always the last one. Happy birthday Dan. Read heads rule.

\>_Read heads rule._

Yes, they do ;-) Thanks again.
Happy MEGA belated, holmes!
